trans-unit.source: Specifies a custom virtual-directory hierarchy for a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Web 應用程式的自訂虛擬目錄階層架構。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.VirtualDirectoryMapping" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.VirtualDirectoryMapping" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A string value that specifies the absolute path to a physical directory.
trans-unit.target: 字串值，指定實體目錄的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the virtual directory is the application root of the Web application.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出虛擬目錄是否為 Web 應用程式的應用程式根目錄。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.VirtualDirectoryMapping" /> class based on supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 根據提供的參數，建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.VirtualDirectoryMapping" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A string value that specifies the absolute path to a physical directory.
trans-unit.target: 字串值，指定實體目錄的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the virtual directory is the application root of the Web application.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出虛擬目錄是否為 Web 應用程式的應用程式根目錄。

trans-unit.source: The name of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 組態檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.VirtualDirectoryMapping" /> class based on supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 根據提供的參數，建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.VirtualDirectoryMapping" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定組態檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the name of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 指出組態檔名稱的值。

trans-unit.source: If the name of the configuration file is not specified, Web.config is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定組態檔的名稱，則會使用 Web.config。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is null or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 選取的值為 null 或空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the virtual directory should be treated as the application root.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出虛擬目錄是否應視為應用程式根目錄。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the virtual directory should be treated as the application root.
trans-unit.target: 指出虛擬目錄是否應視為應用程式根目錄的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the full server path of a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定 Web 應用程式的完整伺服器路徑。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the full server path of a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 指出 Web 應用程式之完整伺服器路徑的值。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is invalid or fails internal security validation.
trans-unit.target: 選取的值無效或未通過內部安全性驗證。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies the virtual directory relative to the root of the Web server.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定相對於 Web 伺服器根目錄的虛擬目錄。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the relative Web-application directory.
trans-unit.target: 指出相對 Web 應用程式目錄的值。
